Lindsey and her friend Tanya are bored and steal the newspaper you're in to
12512.content:
Realizing you are about to be crushed you deftly dodge out of the way just as Amanda's feet slam down where you were. "Well, that was certainly close" you think to yourself. Now you just have the tiny {no pun intended} problem of getting into your house and getting some help. The question is, how the heck are you going to do that? A quick survey of your surroundings shows your home in front of you. A somewhat curved concrete driveway in between two neatly trimmed grass lawns leads up to your home. All that is between you and the front door is the mailbox, and the Friday newspaper lying rolled up and bagged in the driveway. Nothing more than a long walk to your destination, but thinking about this you realize you have no way of getting past the door, yet alone scaling the smooth plaster wall and getting to a window, which aren't opened anyway. You realize you better do something fast though as more people just turned the corner on the street and are walking towards you.
You make a snap decision and decide hiding inside the middle of the newspaper is the best way to get into the house. You'll just let someone else carry you in, nice and simple. Your older sister Hannah's afternoon hobby is to read the paper in the afternoon for an hour or so, especially on a Friday, and she ought to be along any minute now. "Well this oughta be simple enough," you figure. "What harm can come from hiding in here for awhile?" You dash over and crawl inside the bag and find a newspaper section to hide in and wait for Hannah.
12512.title: How to get in?

"What is it this time, Tanya!", she said, frustrated."Lets take this paper, it might have something interesting in it(no pun intended), well, whaddya say?"" Ok, but there better be something interesting in it."
125122.title: Lost Property, Now Found

1252.content:
You are shrunk in your brothers room. You don't remember how you got here. Only standing an inch tall it is a whole new world.
You look around and see your 19 year old brother sleeping in bed. His size 12 foot is handing down off the bed. You walk over cautiously. You have to navigate throught cloths and basketball shoes. your brother loves basketball shoes. He is a huge basketball player.
You get to his foot. The stinch is horrible. You get nervous but for some reason you are aroused by how small you are and his giant foot. Something that could kill you in an instant turns you on so much.
You stop in front of it and touch it. The skin is so soft and cold. You walk under it. You run your hand over the bottom.
Then you hear a grunt. You run but then the foot comes down on you. You are stuck but with the carpet, you just sink into it.
Then your brother gets up. You feel the pressure of his massive weight.
He starts to walk towards the bathroom. The bathroom has a hard tiled floor. You can't get unstuck from his sticky foot. If he steps on the bathroom floor with you under his foot, you would surly die.
He gets closer and closer. You can't get off. His other foot steps on the tile. You don't see it but you can hear his foot hit. Then the other. It lifts up and you watch as your death will soon be upon you. His foot comes down but you are still alive. You are stuck to his arch meaning you won't be crushed.
He sits down on the tolite. You feel the warmth from his foot. You wiggle around. Then he gets quite.
" What the??" you hear him say.
Did he find you. His hand comes down towards the foot you are on. Will he find you?
1252.title: Touch his foot
